holidays.title: Fall Equinox
holidays.description: The days are getting shorter, the nights longer, and the cool, crisp weather rolls in.

holidays.title: National Ice Cream Cone Day
holidays.description: How can you eat ice cream in your hands without making a mess?

holidays.title: National Singles Day
holidays.description: A 24-hour period where it’s okay to be about “me, me, me.”

holidays.title: American Business Women’s Day
holidays.description: Who runs the world? Girls! Who runs the business world? Businesswomen!

holidays.title: Car-free Sunday
holidays.description: It is time for us to ditch our cars, and celebrate Car-Free Sunday!

holidays.title: Chainmail Day
holidays.description: Today, we celebrate an ancient piece of defense armor.

holidays.title: Dear Diary Day
holidays.description: Prepare your pens and notebooks as we mark a day dear to us all.

holidays.title: Falls Prevention Awareness Day
holidays.description: It’s a very serious matter that we all need to be paying attention to.

holidays.title: Hobbit Day
holidays.description: Gandalf the Grey said it best: “Hobbits really are amazing creatures.”

holidays.title: International Day of Radiant Peace
holidays.description: Prepare your hearts and minds in celebration of the Radiant Peace that connects us all.

holidays.title: Mali Independence Day
holidays.description: We're exploring the history, culture, celebrations, and importance of Mali Independence Day.

holidays.title: National Centenarian's Day
holidays.description: Ready your minds as we celebrate and draw insight from the deep wells of centenarian wisdom.

holidays.title: National Dante Day
holidays.description: Dante is a charming, masculine name of Italian origin with a “lasting” meaning.

holidays.title: National Elephant Appreciation Day
holidays.description: A great time to give these majestic and beautiful creatures the respect they deserve.

holidays.title: National Girls’ Night In Day
holidays.description: Call up the girls, it’s time to pour some drinks and reconnect!

holidays.title: National Khalid Day
holidays.description: Khalid is a strong name in Islam that is packed with meaning and steeped in culture.

holidays.title: National Legwear Day
holidays.description: We’ve got everything you need to know about legwear to celebrate this day in extravagant style.

holidays.title: National White Chocolate Day
holidays.description: Find luscious white chocolate basking in non-debatable sweet creamy goodness!

holidays.title: Remember Me Thursday
holidays.description: Honor our stray, abandoned, and orphaned pets today, because their lives matter too.

holidays.title: World Car-Free Day
holidays.description: Take this opportunity to explore your community by walking, biking, or using public transportation.

holidays.title: World Rhino Day
holidays.description: Rhinos are slowly becoming an endangered species. Awareness is needed to keep all five species alive.

holidays.title: Billie Piper’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actress has mastered the art of bringing movie characters to life.

holidays.title: Mark Johnson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This celebrated hockey player is nothing short of a legend of all times.

holidays.title: Michael Faraday’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous scientist is a fundamental figure in the world of science.

holidays.title: Moneybagg Yo’s Birthday
holidays.description: When talent and heart combine, we are certainly on the verge of success.

holidays.title: Mystikal’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mystikal has been a staple in the hip-hop and rap industries for years.

holidays.title: Tom Felton’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is much more than his Harry Potter role; this classically trained actor excels on many fronts.
